means: 以某种方式，用某种方法
<非正>不知怎么地，不知道怎样，不晓得什么缘故

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高一英语词汇表 ... woozy adj. 眩晕的；虚弱的 somehow adv. 某种方式；莫明其妙地；不知怎么地 shelter n. 掩蔽；掩蔽处；避身处.
词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... water-skiing 滑水 somehow 不知何故 Fridge=refrigerator 冰箱.
英语单词立体记忆 ... → someone 某人，有人；重要人物 → somehow 以某种方式，不知怎么的 → something 某事，某物.
光盘制作联盟 - 系统英语编程 ... ◆convince v. 使…信服 ◆somehow adv. 不知怎么搞地，不知什么原因 ◆disturb v. 令人不安.

list.abs: You know that someday I will 总有一天,  Someday, somehow 总有一天, Gonna make it all right but not right now 一切都会变好,但不是现在  I know.
7月17日 whatever this town... ... Inside out （彻底) Somehow someday （也许）可能有一天 You will love me too 你将也爱上我.

list.exp: 不知是什么原因有一天
list.abs: ... Cuz I don't have forever 因为我不能永远拥有 Somehow someday 不知是什么原因有一天 You will love me too 你将也爱我.

means.word_mean: 以某种方法,设法地,不择手段

encyclopedia.content: 英音/美音 ：['s∧mhau]词典解释 ：以某种方式（方法） we must stop her for seeing him somehow 由于某种原因 somehow,idon't feel i can trust him.

entry.tran: 不知怎样;用某种方法;不知什么缘故;不知怎的
entry.def: You use somehow to say that you do not know or cannot say how something was done or will be done.

example.ex: We'll  manage somehow, you and me. I know we will...
example.tran: 我和你，我们总能应付过去的。我知道我们会的。

example.ex: Channel 4 arrived and somehow created a different role for television...
example.tran: 第四频道开播了，它在某种程度上为电视创造了一个不同的角色。

means.word_mean: 1. in some unspecified way or manner; or by some unspecified means;

sentences.sentence: "he expected somehow to discover a woman who would love him"
"he tried to make is someway acceptable"
"he had me dead to rights but somehow I got away with it"
"for some reason they didn't seem to match"

auth_sentence.content: Somehow, ineffably, Gary Neville wins every time.
auth_sentence.res_content: Somehow, ineffably, Gary Neville wins every time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Somehow, ineffably, Gary Neville wins every time.

auth_sentence.content: It is somehow both brilliantly boisterous and horrendously bland.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is somehow both brilliantly boisterous and horrendously bland.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is somehow both brilliantly boisterous and horrendously bland.

auth_sentence.content: Does he think it makes him look smart somehow?
auth_sentence.res_content: Does he think it makes him look smart somehow?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Does he think it makes him look smart somehow?

Sentence.sentence: Somehow the old male and female stereotypes no longer fit.

sentences.en: We must get the work finished somehow by tomorrow morning.
sentences.cn: 我们必须设法在明天早上以前把工作做完。
